creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
description: recto:  silhouette of a striding man wearing a tall top hat, boots and a neck scarf, walking with a cane and carrying a basket with a duck; line drawing three cottages--one at left with smoking chimney--behind man; verso:  two drawings:  top sketch in black ink of a standing man, 3/4 view, wearing a long coat, billowing scarf, cap and spats; man has a very long nose; bottom sketch in graphite of a standing old man, 3/4 view, wearing a cap, a tunic, tights and spats, smoking a small pipe; two cottages in background
medium: Pen and ink and graphite on card
title: Untitled, recto and verso [silhouette of a walking man with a duck in a basket, recto; man in hat and man smoking with two cottages, verso]
